docs.snippet: The English Football Association has fined Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho 10,000 pounds ($16,900) for bringing the game into disrepute with sarcastic comments about match officials....
docs.lead_paragraph: The English Football Association has fined Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho 10,000 pounds ($16,900) for bringing the game into disrepute with sarcastic comments about match officials.

headline.main: Mourinho Fined After Sarcastic Praise for Referee
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Fined After Sarcastic Praise for Referee

docs.snippet: The debate over whether college athletes have the right to unionize moved to the U.S. Congress on Thursday, with witnesses that included Baylor University President Ken Starr voicing opposition....
docs.lead_paragraph: The debate over whether college athletes have the right to unionize moved to the U.S. Congress on Thursday, with witnesses that included Baylor University President Ken Starr voicing opposition.

headline.main: U.S. House Hears Witnesses Opposed to Union for College Athletes
headline.print_headline: U.S. House Hears Witnesses Opposed to Union for College Athletes

docs.snippet: Coach Laurent Blanc has signed a one-year contract extension that will keep him at Paris St Germain until at least 2016, the French champions said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Laurent Blanc has signed a one-year contract extension that will keep him at Paris St Germain until at least 2016, the French champions said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Helena Costa, the former coach of the Qatar and Iran women’s national teams, will become the first woman to coach a men’s professional team in France....
docs.lead_paragraph: Helena Costa, the former coach of the Qatar and Iran women’s national teams, will become the first woman to coach a men’s professional team in France.
docs.abstract: Clermont Foot 63, a second-division soccer club in France, announces that Helena Costa will take over as its manager at the end of current season; Costa will be the first woman to be manager in one of the top two divisions of one of Europe's five major professional leagues--England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain.

headline.seo: Hired by Clermont Foot, Helena Costa Sets Major Soccer Milestone
headline.main: French Soccer Club Hires Woman to Coach Its Men
headline.print_headline: A Woman Fulfills a Dream of Coaching a Men’s Pro Team

docs.snippet: With a club career in freefall and his name all but forgotten by South Korean fans and media, Park Chu-young's chances of being on a plane to Brazil for the World Cup finals this summer looked slim at best, as he faded behind the scenes at Arsenal...
docs.lead_paragraph: With a club career in freefall and his name all but forgotten by South Korean fans and media, Park Chu-young's chances of being on a plane to Brazil for the World Cup finals this summer looked slim at best, as he faded behind the scenes at Arsenal.

headline.main: Mind the Gap! Forgotten Front Man Park Seals World Cup Place
headline.print_headline: Mind the Gap! Forgotten Front Man Park Seals World Cup Place

docs.snippet: Baylor University President Ken Starr voiced strong opposition Thursday to a regional National Labor Relations Board ruling that scholarship football players at Northwestern University are technically school employees and thus entitled to collecti...
docs.lead_paragraph: Baylor University President Ken Starr voiced strong opposition Thursday to a regional National Labor Relations Board ruling that scholarship football players at Northwestern University are technically school employees and thus entitled to collective bargaining rights.

headline.main: Witnesses Oppose NLRB Ruling on College Athletes
headline.print_headline: Witnesses Oppose NLRB Ruling on College Athletes

docs.snippet: Former Socceroos coach Graham Arnold believes the clear-out of Australia's golden generation should have happened earlier but has backed Ange Postecoglou's team to do the country proud at the World Cup in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Socceroos coach Graham Arnold believes the clear-out of Australia's golden generation should have happened earlier but has backed Ange Postecoglou's team to do the country proud at the World Cup in Brazil.

headline.main: Youth Will Do Australia Proud in Brazil, Says Former Coach
headline.print_headline: Youth Will Do Australia Proud in Brazil, Says Former Coach

docs.snippet: Marty Dowd has been the men's tennis coach at Catholic University for more than a half-century, and he's finally going to the NCAA tournament. He'll arrive with his sense of humor firmly intact....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marty Dowd has been the men's tennis coach at Catholic University for more than a half-century, and he's finally going to the NCAA tournament. He'll arrive with his sense of humor firmly intact.

headline.main: In 52nd Season, Catholic Tennis Coach Off to NCAAs
headline.print_headline: In 52nd Season, Catholic Tennis Coach Off to NCAAs

docs.snippet: The Houston Texans beefed up their defensive line by taking extraordinary pass rusher Jadeveon Clowney from the University of South Carolina with the first pick of the 2014 National Football League Draft on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Houston Texans beefed up their defensive line by taking extraordinary pass rusher Jadeveon Clowney from the University of South Carolina with the first pick of the 2014 National Football League Draft on Thursday.

headline.main: Texans Take DE Clowney With First Pick in NFL Draft

docs.snippet: The Texas high school made famous in the book "Friday Night Lights" said Thursday that a longtime teacher committed suicide a day after being questioned about an alleged improper relationship with a student, the school's fifth former staffer to fa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Texas high school made famous in the book "Friday Night Lights" said Thursday that a longtime teacher committed suicide a day after being questioned about an alleged improper relationship with a student, the school's fifth former staffer to face such accusations in a little more than a year.

headline.main: Accusations, Death at 'Friday Night Lights' School
headline.print_headline: Accusations, Death at 'Friday Night Lights' School
